extendedInfo.description: Exsoul Web Browser makes your browsing faster and richer and has usability which ensures the comfortable Internet use.Features: - Go back or forward across several histories at once. - Search contents on several search engines. - Google, Yahoo, Bing, DuckDuckGo, Twitter, facebook, YouTube. - Search suggestion. - Open in another browser. - Translate contents. - Add favorite links to Speed Dial. - Buttons are arranged in a way to enable users to use with one hand. - Tabbed browsing let you open up to 12 websites at the same time. - Can see a desktop websites using a quick user-agent switching. - Import bookmarks from the default browser. - Work in 21 languages including English, French, German, Spanish, Chinese, and Japanese. - After installing, users can start the internet without any initialization. - Clear cache and history on exiting. - Save pages as PDF. - Support Adobe Flash Player on Android 2.2 and up. - Open in background tab. - Change volume button action - Page up/down, tab switching.Check out http://www.exsoul-browser.com/

reviews.title: Best browser ever
reviews.comment: Even more better than chrome .. And compatible w older android versions
reviews.author: mahmood morsy

reviews.comment: Nice
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wuut
reviews.comment: Wut license key??
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great Browser!
reviews.comment: It works, feels, and performs better than Chrome or Firefox. It would be worth a purchase if the bookmarks were a bit more customizable for additional folders and syncing.
reviews.author: Joseph Bitter

reviews.title: Very good
reviews.comment: Smooth, flash, user agent, text reflow, really good. The only thing that is missing is folders for bookmarks. Really, if you have over 100 bookmarks it\'s not very practical to have them all in one list. Fifth star if this is added.  It would make this browser the best.
reviews.author: Guy De Vos

reviews.title: Dated garbage
reviews.comment: This is a really really BAD browser! It wouldn\'t even load a page until I pressed the phones HW back button.
reviews.author: Gianluca Badejo

reviews.title: This is a great browser.
reviews.comment: Excellent browser- has everything I\'ve been trying to get in Chrome, Firefox, Opera, etc. Thanks for the DDG support!
reviews.author: cobs cobbles

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: I\'d like to be able to import my bookmarks from the default browser. Also I wish I could have the address bar automatically show when I scroll up the page. Otherwise, very good browser.
reviews.author: Oliver Harrison

reviews.title: Best browser so far.
reviews.comment: So far this browser performs better than the stock browser, Firefox, Chrome, and a few others. Fifth star if a better bookmark organization is implemented.
reviews.author: William Michaeli

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Very good browser fast, smooth etc but it crashes when playing flash video on galaxy S4. Please please fix.
reviews.author: mulalo magadzu

reviews.title: Great browser
reviews.comment: In spite of a few shortcomings i still chose it over the others because of its ability to continues to play videos when I am in another tab or application, a function that is necessary for me. It is not there yet but with a few more improvements its gonna be second to none. Great app!
reviews.author: younge nicson

reviews.title: Great browser!
reviews.comment: Fast and allow me to browse any website.
reviews.author: Jimy Prince

reviews.title: And theeennn....
reviews.comment: Excellent performance, way better than chrome or Mozilla, more features than opera, stunning UI, thought I had finally found a browser than I\'m happy with! And theeeeen I go to upload a photo to Facebook. Couldn\'t handle it, became unresponsive. Disappointing but its good nonetheless.
reviews.author: Daniel T.

reviews.title: Good but.
reviews.comment: Nice browser. But it needs a good download maneger.
reviews.author: Antarik Mondal

reviews.title: Lied
reviews.comment: Does not support flash I have the updated adobe fash.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good browser
reviews.comment: Its easy to use,enable plug-ins for flash is  one of the add ons that i love in a browser and my day is complete...aim more...
reviews.author: Maynard Alejandrino

reviews.title: Slow and unresponsive.
reviews.comment: Waste of time. Very poorly done. Crashes, does not respond and it is very, very very slow.
reviews.author: bryan mccarthy

reviews.title: Sucks
reviews.comment: One browser is better and faster
reviews.author: wut sergio

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Lots of options, fast, no problems. I like the settings menu. Excellent UI/UX.
reviews.author: Ed Nafziger

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Nice app
reviews.author: Mohamed Irshad
